entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:12 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 11:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -35.3°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
